mmwave_link_spi_22xx.c File Reference

The file implements the mmWave control module which interfaces with the mmWave Link API and communicates with the Front end radar device. More...

Detailed Description

The file implements the mmWave control module which interfaces with the mmWave Link API and communicates with the Front end radar device.

Function Documentation

static int32_t MMWave_disableDevice ( rlUInt8_t  deviceIndex)
static

Description
This is the mmWave link registered callback function to power off and disable the device

Parameters
[in]deviceIndexDevice index which is to be disabled
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0

static

Description
This is the mmWave link registered callback function to power on and enable the XWR1XX device

Parameters
[in]deviceIndexDevice index which is to be enabled
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0

Return values

int32_t MMWave_registerInterruptHandler ( rlUInt8_t  deviceIndex,
RL_P_EVENT_HANDLER  pHandler,
void *  pValue 
)
static

Description
This is the mmWave link registered callback function to register the interrupt handler.

Parameters
[in]deviceIndexDevice index for which the interrupt is to be registered
[in]pHandlerISR Handler
[in]pValueArgument to the ISR
Return values
Alwaysreturns 0
static void MMWave_unmaskHostIRQ ( rlComIfHdl_t  fd)
static

Description
This is the mmWave link registered callback function to unmask the interrupts to indicate that the message has been successfully handled

Parameters
[in]fdHandle to the communication interface
Return values
Notapplicable
static int32_t MMWave_waitIRQStatus ( rlComIfHdl_t  fd,
rlUInt8_t  level 
)
static

Description
This is the mmWave link registered callback function to poll the host interrupt status.

Parameters
[in]fdHandle to the communication interface
[in]levelWait for IRQ Level(high/low)
Return values
returnsGPIO level (high/low)
